name: UnofficialWVUPersonalRapidTransit
0:
”Alexa open Transit Helper”
”Alexa ask Transit Helper the status of the PRT”
”Alexa ask Transit Helper if the PRT is running”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: transit helper
des:
This skill will provide information on whether the Personal Rapid Transit system is currently open and running on a normal schedule or not. The information given includes current running status, what (if any) stations are currently down, whether buses have been dispatched and also the estimated time until returning to normal operation.

This application is not affiliated with nor sponsored by West Virginia University or any related organization.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
